underlying_goal: Add a feature to the 'LLM Council' application to enable/disable reasoning/thinking mode for different stages of the process.
primary_success: Guided the user through a structured design process using brainstorming techniques, converting a high-level feature request into a detailed technical specification.
brief_summary: The user wanted to add a 'reasoning mode' toggle to the LLM Council app. The agent initiated a brainstorming session, asking a series of multiple-choice questions to define the feature's behavior, UI, and backend logic, resulting in a detailed design specification.
